msg: Update test so that its not using a fixed port for the brokerUri.

author: jens
msg: InMemory server: fix a small bug where some query operators fail on system properties

author: jmsnell
msg: Proper dependency scoping... previously, the top level pom pulled in all of the dependencies, so no matter which modules you selected, you still got all of the dependencies for everything... which was fine for testing, but this limits the dependencies to each individual module.
